restaurant.name: Fusion Frank's
restaurant.description: A bold take on global street food, specializing in creative hot-dog fusion cuisine.
restaurant.about: At Fusion Frank’s, we blend the comfort of the classic American hot dog with flavors from around the world. Whether it’s Korean kimchi, Vietnamese banh mi, or a Tex-Mex twist, every dish is crafted to surprise your taste buds. We’re passionate about reinventing traditions and serving up unexpected flavor combinations in a fun, casual setting.
